item.title: Audio and Video Editing - Upwork
item.description:
Simple editing of informal conversations recorded on Zoom that are on average one hour and fifteen minutes long. Create a simple intro + outro and add them to the videos. Our end goal is to start a YouTube channel. We also have several audio recordings that need background noise eliminated or significantly reduced.

item.title: Photography/Edits of a finished Car Wash business - Upwork
item.description:
I am seeking a photographer to take premium quality photos and make professional edits of a finished Car Wash business in Detroit, Michigan.

My company is a construction firm that built the location, so the goal is to have the photos represent our high-quality, clean, impressive work building the location.

The edits for the photos are to be completed and returned to me directly or via a link within five (5) business days. However, this is flexible should the work require extra time invested for a high-quality deliverable. If the photographer has a drone and is able to take photos and/or video with the drone in addition to their camera, this is a huge plus, and they will likely be given priority consideration for being hired for the project.

Please review the attached document and images for guidelines and successful examples.
I look forward to working with you!

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 18, 2024 20:04 UTC
Category: Image Editing
Skills:Photo Manipulation, Photo Color Correction, Photography, Photo Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Photo Retouching, Image Editing, Camera, Adobe Lightroom, Drone Videography
Skills: Photo Manipulation, Photo Color Correction, Photography, Photo Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Photo Retouching, Image Editing, Camera, Adobe Lightroom, Drone Videography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Video Editor Needed to create high-quality, professional videos using Adobe Premiere Pro. - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video editor with experience in Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects, to advertise our metal retail displays. As a leader in the retail industry, we are dedicated to providing innovative and visually appealing display solutions for our clients.

Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with our team to understand project requirements and objectives.
- Develop creative videos to advertise our retail displays that align with our branding and objectives.
- Create professional, corporate, engaging video to interest customers and get them to buy.
- Communicate effectively with team members to iterate on videos and incorporate feedback.

Requirements:
- Experience in using Adobe Premiere Pro and Adobe After Effects.
- Most videos will need a narrator voice in the background (it has to sound like a real person).
- We will send you the videos and scripts to create the finished product.
- Multiple different video formats including: about us videos, assembly instructions, manufacturing capabilities videos, short SM ads

If you are passionate about retail design and have the skills to produce professional and engaging videos to the table, we would love to hear from you.

Please submit your portfolio along with your resume for consideration.


Hourly Range: $48.00-$72.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 19:56 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Corporate Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Corporate Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Talented Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
Hello talented short form video editors,

Clience is seeking a skilled Video Editor to join our creative team. If you have a flair for storytelling and can create impactful videos that leave an impression, we want to work with you!

Company Overview:
Clience is a dynamic marketing agency that specializes in creating compelling video content for our clients. We use the content to run paid ads and to also post on their socials along with their websites. We work with diverse businesses to elevate their brand stories and connect with their target audiences through the power of visual storytelling.

Role Responsibilities:

- Editing and crafting short form, long form, testimonial & commercial videos for various platforms, including social media, advertisements, and promotional content.
- Collaborating with the creative team to develop video concepts and narratives that align with clients' marketing objectives.
- Applying creative transitions, effects, captions and audio enhancements to elevate the overall video quality.
- Ensuring videos are optimized for different platforms and formats, considering aspect ratios and file sizes.
- Staying updated with industry trends and best practices to deliver cutting-edge video content.

Required Skills:

- Proven experience in video editing with a strong portfolio showcasing your creative projects.
- Proficiency in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
- Strong storytelling abilities and a keen eye for visual aesthetics.
- Knowledge of video formats, compression, and export settings for various platforms.
- Excellent communication skills to collaborate effectively with clients and team members.
- Ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 19:55 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Animation
Skills: Video Commercial, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Animation
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for YouTube and Dirtbike Motocross Reels - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a talented video editor who knows their way around Red Camera files for YouTube videos and reels, specifically in the Dirtbike motocross niche. The perfect candidate should bring their creativity and technical expertise to make our videos top-notch and engaging. As a video editor, your job will involve cutting, trimming, and arranging footage, adding cool effects, transitions, and soundtracks, and making sure the final product meets our brand standards.

Required Skills:
- Good at editing Red Camera files
- Solid understanding of YouTube video editing techniques and trends
- Knowledge of Dirtbike motocross content and style
- Able to work with raw footage to make it look polished
- Proficient in video editing software like Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
- Pays great attention to detail and can meet deadlines

If you're passionate about motocross and have the technical skills to create visually stunning videos, we'd love to hear from you.

Please share examples of your past work and let us know your availability.

Hourly Range: $7.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 19:54 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: CAN

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
SALESBOX, an on-Demand Sales company is looking to expand its team by adding a new Video Editor.

We are looking for an experienced and creative Video Editor to join our team! As a Video Editor you will be responsible for editing videos for internal and external purposes. As video has become the best way for communicating a company's messages on online platforms, your position will play an important role in our company's success.  

Responsibilities
Creating videos for web and social media using Adobe Creative Suite.
Manage and oversee all technical aspects of video editing.
Ensure videos meet the brand’s specifications and guidelines.
Proficient video and sound design skills to create promotional videos.
Ability to create interactive videos and shorts with motion graphics using only raw footage or audio.
Ability to create new video templates or improve existing templates while creating multimedia content.
Excellent attention to detail to ensure high-quality and error-free video productions within the provided deadlines.
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities to identify and report bugs effectively.
Excellent communication skills to provide clear and concise bug reports to the development team.
Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams, including developers and graphic designers.
Strong organisational skills to maintain accurate records and track the progress of videos created.
Willingness to learn and adapt to new tools and technologies.

Essential Qualifications:
A proven work experience as a video editor.
A strong portfolio (having a showreel is a bonus).
A good grip on colour correction, colour grading and sound editing.
A solid experience in: Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, Premiere Pro, After Effects only - DaVinci Resolve is a bonus).
A thorough knowledge of timing, motivation and continuity.
A drive for creative initiative within the team.


Posted On: June 18, 2024 19:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Professional Musician with Modern Studio for Content Creation - Upwork
item.description:
Location: Remote

Company: SoundBridge, LLC

About Us:
SoundBridge, LLC is a pioneering company in the digital audio workstation (DAW) industry, dedicated to providing innovative tools and resources for musicians and producers. Our mission is to empower artists to create, produce, and share their music effortlessly. We are expanding our content creation team and looking for a talented professional musician with a modern studio setup to join us.

Job Description:

We are seeking a professional musician with a passion for music production and a well-equipped modern studio to create high-quality music production content. The ideal candidate will produce engaging tutorials, demos, and other educational materials that showcase the capabilities of our DAW software and inspire our user community.

Responsibilities:

Create comprehensive and engaging music production tutorials using SoundBridge DAW.

Produce high-quality audio and video content demonstrating various features and techniques.

Develop and record music production demos, walkthroughs, and performance videos.

Collaborate with the marketing and product teams to align content with company goals and product updates.

Share insights and tips on music production, sound design, mixing, and mastering.

Stay updated on the latest trends in music production and incorporate them into content.

Interact with the SoundBridge user community to gather feedback and tailor content to their needs.

Requirements:

Proven experience as a professional musician with a strong portfolio of music production work.

Proficient in using SoundBridge DAW or similar DAW software.
Access to a modern, well-equipped studio with high-quality audio and video recording capabilities.

Strong understanding of music production, sound design, mixing, and mastering.

Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written.

Ability to produce clear, concise, and engaging tutorials and demos.

Experience with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro) is a plus.

Creative mindset with the ability to generate new content ideas regularly.

Strong presence on social media platforms and familiarity with engaging online communities.

Preferred Qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in Music, Audio Engineering, or a related field.
Experience teaching or creating educational content in music production.

Active participation in music production forums, social media groups, and other online communities.

Familiarity with current trends and technologies in the music industry.

What We Offer:

Flexible working hours and remote work environment.

Opportunity to work with a passionate and innovative team at the forefront of music technology.

Professional development opportunities.

A creative and collaborative work culture.

Hourly Range: $16.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 19:46 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:Content Writing, Music Production, Graphic Design, Audio Editing, Audio Production, Music, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Content Writing, Music Production, Graphic Design, Audio Editing, Audio Production, Music, Social Media Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Social Media - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create engaging short form videos for our social media platforms. The ideal candidate should have experience in editing videos specifically for social media, with a strong understanding of current trends and best practices.

This role will involve editing raw footage, adding text, and optimizing videos for various social media platforms. Attention to detail and the ability to work within tight deadlines are essential.  

Skills required:
- Proficient in video editing software
- Strong understanding of social media platforms and their video requirements
- Creative mind with a good sense of storytelling
- Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
- Bonus: Knowledgeable in the parenting space - our target market is parents and caregivers of children ages 5-11

Hourly Range: $10.00-$25.00

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, Social Media Video, TikTok Video, Instagram Story, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Instagram

item.title: Create viral videos for product launch - Upwork
item.description:
Role Overview:

We are seeking a creative and energetic Viral Video Creator. Your primary responsibility will be to produce compelling and shareable video content that highlights our innovative product features and drives engagement across social media platforms.

Key Responsibilities:

• Create engaging and high-quality videos showcasing app's features.
• Develop creative concepts and video scripts that resonate with our target audience.
• Utilize trending topics and viral content strategies to maximize video reach.
• Edit and optimize videos for various social media platforms (TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, etc.).

Requirements:

• Proven experience in creating viral video content, preferably for tech or app products.
• In-depth understanding of social media trends and algorithms.
• Ability to work independently and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
• Portfolio of previous viral videos created.

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 18, 2024 19:29 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing

item.description:
Description:

-This position is for a Fantasy/Travel Youtube Channel video creator (Think movies/TV Shows/Books and Travel locations) with the ability to create videos using engaging clips, moving pictures, multiple royalty free songs, sound effects, and varying paces.

-This is a LONG-TERM position with GREAT benefits such as
Bonuses and raises based on quality work and performance!
-You’re responsible for creating engaging 8–12-minute videos 1-2 times weekly.


Requirements:

1.  English expert
2. Professional software
3. ~72H Or less turnaround time
4. Willing to work long term and grow with the team
5. Ability to create videos with engaging clips, moving pictures, multiple royalty free songs, and sound effects

Bonus:
1. You have a personal interest in Fantasy/Fiction

item.title: Engaging Demo Video Creator for Statifytix Website - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a creative and skilled video maker with a talent for making engaging and informative content? Statifytix, a cutting-edge company specializing in data analytics and web solutions, is looking for you! We need a dynamic demo video that showcases the features of our website and tool in an engaging and visually appealing manner.

We aim to create a presentation video that highlights the functionalities of the Statifytix website and tool. This video will serve as an introductory guide, demonstrating the key features and unique selling points in an active and interesting way. We want the video to capture the attention of our audience and effectively communicate the value of our product.

Budget: $40

Category: Video Production

item.title: Instagram Reels Content Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced content editor to edit our Instagram Reels content. The editor will be responsible for editing short videos, keeping them under 60 seconds in length. We will provide you with a folder of all the content that has been shot. The ideal candidate should have a keen eye for detail and a strong understanding of editing techniques to create engaging and visually appealing Reels.

    Responsibilities:
    - Edit Instagram Reels content to ensure it is under 60 seconds
    - Enhance video quality and add visual effects if necessary
    - Use creative techniques to make the content visually appealing
    - Maintain a consistent style and tone throughout the videos

    Requirements:
    - Proven experience in editing short-form video content
    - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.)
    - Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
    - Familiarity with Instagram Reels and its best practices

    If you are a talented content editor with a passion for creating engaging Instagram Reels, we would love to hear from you. Please provide examples of your previous work for consideration.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 18, 2024 19:17 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Content Writing, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Instagram
Skills: Content Writing, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Instagram
Country: United States
click to apply
